definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: It’s so nice to be able to come “down under’’ to Sydney, thanks to your kind invitation.
sentences.chinese: 你好意邀请，才使我们能够“南下”雪梨。

sentences.english: All southbound trains leave from platform one.

sentences.english: Meanwhile, after uniting the north, Cao Cao prepared to march south.

sentences.english: But his role in Red Cliff effectively delayed Cao Cao's efforts for many many years.
sentences.chinese: 不过他在赤壁的表现让曹操多年不能南下。

sentences.english: "And down in Chihuahua, " said an old man.
sentences.chinese: “就南下墨西哥的奇瓦瓦，”一个白叟说。

sentences.english: Later I left the truck and hitchhiked south.
